metadata.author: ZeroLu
metadata.description: A collection of prompt assets for image generation and editing tasks. Task correlatd to 3D asset creation, image reference for characters, clothing, accessories, environments. Cretaing asset in T-pose frontal and rear for easy rigging and animating.

Make T-Pose (Front/Rear).task: Put the subject in T-pose, both frontal and rear views, for easy rigging and animating.

face.description: The person's facial features, expression, and identity must remain exactly the same as the reference image.

subject.pose: T-pose, both frontal and rear views, for easy rigging and animating. Arms extended 45 degrees horizontally.

Make T-Pose (Front/Rear).background: White or transparent background to isolate the subject.
Make T-Pose (Front/Rear).style: Use the same style of the reference image (realistic photography or digital art or 3D rendered creation)

Make T-Pose (Front).task: Put the subject in T-pose, both frontal view, for easy rigging and animating.

face.description: The person's facial features, expression, and identity must remain exactly the same as the reference image.

subject.pose: T-pose, frontal view only, for easy rigging and animating. Arms extended 45 degrees horizontally.

Make T-Pose (Front).background: White or transparent background to isolate the subject.
Make T-Pose (Front).style: Use the same style of the reference image (realistic photography or digital art or 3D rendered creation)

Make T-Pose (rear).task: Put the subject in T-pose, rear view only, for easy rigging and animating.

face.description: The person's facial features, expression, and identity must remain exactly the same as the reference image.

subject.pose: T-pose, rear view only, for easy rigging and animating. Arms extended 45 degrees horizontally.

Make T-Pose (rear).background: White or transparent background to isolate the subject.
Make T-Pose (rear).style: Use the same style of the reference image (realistic photography or digital art or 3D rendered creation)

Make T-Pose (lateral).task: Put the subject in T-pose, lateral view only, for easy rigging and animating.

face.description: The person's facial features, expression, and identity must remain exactly the same as the reference image.

subject.pose: T-pose, lateral view only, for easy rigging and animating. Arms extended 45 degrees horizontally.

Make T-Pose (lateral).background: White or transparent background to isolate the subject.
Make T-Pose (lateral).style: Use the same style of the reference image (realistic photography or digital art or 3D rendered creation)

Low quality photo enhancemnet.task: Enhance the quality of the low-resolution, blurry, noisy, or pixelated photo to make it high-resolution, sharp, clear, and detailed while preserving the original content and composition of the image.

face.description: The person's facial features, expression, and identity must remain exactly the same as the reference image.
face.red_eyes: remove any red-eye effect if present

photography.style: high-resolution 4K photograph, ultra-detailed, realistic textures, sharp focus

Dress up.task: Edit only the subject's clothing, while preserving the whole reference image, facial features and identity. Change the clothing to the specified outfit.

face.description: The person's facial features, expression, and identity must remain exactly the same as the reference image.

clothing.edit: Change the outfit of this person to the specified outfit.

photography.style: high-resolution 4K photograph, ultra-detailed, realistic textures, sharp focus
photography.quality: realistic social media quality, sharp focus on face and hands

Apply Art Style.task: Edit the subject's image to apply the specified art style, while preserving the subject's facial features and identity.

face.description: The person's facial features, expression, and identity must remain exactly the same as the reference image.
